description: Proservices contracts provide direct access to hundreds of qualified resource professionals.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: TSPS - Business Process Consultant (Level 3)**
================igidBody=========


**Tender Reference Number:** cb-8538-28043892
**Solicitation Number:** P2400201


**enddate proposal reception:** *Friday, September 12, 2023, at 11:00 a.m. (EDT)*


### Introduction
The Canadian Intergovernmental Conference Secretariat (CICS) is issuing a request for proposals for the task-based professional services (TSPS) requirement. The contracting authority is seeking a business process consultant (level 3) to assist with evaluating the effectiveness and efficiency of CICS in delivering its mandate.


### Scope of Work
The scope of work includes assessing the effectiveness of CICS in delivering its mandate, providing recommendations for improvement, and assisting with the implementation of improvements.


### Eligibility
The tender is open only to those supply arrangement (SA) holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the Business Process Consultant category.


### Trade Agreements
The associated trade agreements include the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).


### Estimated Level of Effort
The estimated level of effort of the contract will be approximately 200 days for the initial period, with the option for two additional one-year periods.


### Security Requirements
The security requirements are classified as "Secret" and include:

* Company minimum security level required: Protected A
* Resource minimum security level required: Protected A


### Proposal Submission Instructions
Submissions should be made through the CanadaBuys portal, with a proposal acceptance deadline of September 12, 2023, at 11:00 a.m. (EDT). The issued RFx (Request for Proposal) document is available for download.


### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Zachary St Louis at Zachary.stem-lous@scics.ca.



__
Attachments:

-   [RFx Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8538/npp-english.pdf)
-   [RFx Document (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8538/npp-francais_fr.pdf)
